misc: Always a gentleman despite occasionally losing his temper on the course
biography: Daniel is a familiar face at the Hector Trophée, representing Oulujokilaakson Golfklubi ry with distinction. While known for his otherwise calm and collected demeanor, Daniel's passion for the game occasionally surfaces in bursts of on-course frustration. Despite these infrequent displays, he remains a true gentleman of the sport.

Daniel has participated in 7 previous Hector Trophée tournaments and has secured the coveted Hector Trophée on 2 occasions. Although he has yet to claim the Victor Trophy, his consistent performance makes him a formidable competitor.

While Daniel is not currently slated to participate in Hector Trophée 2025, fans remain hopeful that he may yet join the field. His continued activity in Hector events suggests that his absence may only be temporary. Should he compete, his experience and skill would undoubtedly make him a strong contender for the title.
